duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional customer service to promote products and build brand relationships.
Assist the management team in building store business and supporting service enhancers.
Service multiple customers at a time, multitask, and handle projects simultaneously.
Stay aware of fashion trends and seek information about new arrivals, including product knowledge.
Use product knowledge and fashion expertise to create outfits for customers and suggest items to match their needs.
Participate in learning opportunities, accept direction, coaching, and feedback to maximize individual performance.
Achieve sales and service metrics in key measurable areas including clientelling/outreach, appointment setting, and awards.
Complete assigned projects including operational tasks like order filling, replenishment, and recovery.
